about_the_game:
OVERVIEW
Submerge into a new paradigm and grasp the bleeding edge, blast into a dark far future where all that stands is the dominion of strength and wisdom.

CYCO is the first game of it's kind, self-titled an 'All-Range Fighting Game' with a high emphasis on fast paced real-time precision combat and on the fly advanced movement, though, victory lies somewhere between the two.

COMBAT
Three Stances. Three Attack Vectors. Three Dimensions. Extruding the fighting game genre into 3D space and including 3D world space geometry creates an infinite amount of new possibilities and secrets waiting to be cracked open. There are so many different combos and combat conditions that it is currently unknown the scope of what is fully possible with this combat system. While the options are unlimited, there is always a better way. He who adapts first, wins.

MOVEMENT Lunge, power-slide, pounce, bunny-hop, short-hop, full-hop, sprint, climb, crawl; While gravity condemns you to the mud, defy kinetics and command your position in this world. The suite of advance movement systems aims to supplant 'Can I?" with "How will I?"

STORY CYCO brings to the table a depiction of a totally alien: low-tech future, people, and combat paradigm, though, some things appear to be constant; Man is returning to the ancient order of wisdom and strength at cost of the estrangement of intelligence and socialization, some may resent the notion, while others may find comfort in it.

While the story presents itself in a cold, unthinking, casually grizzly nature, there lies a glint in the shadow, one last star hanging in the moonless night sky, one final shot piercing through the dark: The wellspring of hope, meaning, purpose, only dwells in the misty eyes of the small.

content_descriptors.notes: Includes intense violence, blood and bodily dismemberment.

detailed_description:
NEW ENGINE RE-RELEASE

On July 15th 2024, two years after the initial release of the game, we have re-invented the game from the ground-up using a new engine. This re-imagined version is much closer to the true idea of the game.

  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce GTX 1050 Equivalent
